questions.question: This TV show parodied Jeopardy + celebrities w/ soft ball questions, non-answers and bad behavior. "Suck on it Trebek!"
This IBM computer system beat two human champions in a match shown over three days.
The person credited as the show's creator
The part of the game w/ the heaviest game theory. Arthur Chu did well w/ it in early 2014. Remember second place!
questions.answer: What is wagering in Final Jeopardy?

questions.question: These two champions got themselves a beat down from a IBM computer system on a human vs machine challenge aired over three days.
questions.answer: Who are Ken Jennings and Brad Rutter?
